lead_paragraph: An article on Aug. 24 about the plight of Tour of the Cat and other former champion race horses who end up at risk of being abandoned, euthanized or slaughtered referred incorrectly to the closure in 2007 of the last United States horse slaughterhouses. They were closed by the authorities in Texas and Illinois under state laws, not by the federal government.
